enemyClases

Class Soldier

  • java.lang.Object
    • enemyClases.Soldier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnemyClass

    public class Soldier
extends java.lang.Object
implements EnemyClass
    Implements the Enemy Class Soldier, with 20 Base HP, 3 Base Attack Points, and special Attack ability of 2x multiplier if the player last action was running
    Author:
    teohoch
